# propertiesToUpdate

**Instance Property**

A dictionary of property description pairs that describe the updates.

## Declaration

```swift
var propertiesToUpdate: [AnyHashable : Any]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The dictionary keys are either [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSPropertyDescription] objects or strings that identify the property name.

The dictionary values are either a constant value or an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSExpression] that evaluates to a scalar value.

## Configuring a Request

- **entity**: The managed entity to update data for.
- **entityName**: The name of the managed entity to update data for.
- **includesSubentities**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to update subentities.
- **predicate**: A predicate that identifies the objects to update.
- **resultType**: The type of result that Core Data returns from the request.
